Description: Monsoon rains caused severe flooding in low-lying areas of Ahmedabad.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and disrupted transportation.
Public protests led to road closures and traffic disruptions in the city.
The impact of Cyclone Nisarga resulted in strong winds and power outages.
A major industrial fire led to evacuations and environmental concerns.
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 47Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Ahmedabad.
A sudden hailstorm caused damage to crops and vehicles in the city.
A moderate earthquake with a magnitude of 4.9 shook the city.
A terrorist attack in a crowded market area resulted in casualties and chaos.
